articles.description: Scientists reveal the first complete neural map of an adult brain, mapping every neuron and connection for new insights into brain function.
articles.content:
Imagine gazing at the intricate yet beautiful map of an entire city, but the city is in fact a brain. Sounds fascinating, doesn’t it? Well, scientists have now made this a reality.

articles.title: The threat of solar storms explained - BBC.com
articles.description: What damage could ferocious solar explosions wreak on our vulnerable planet?
